Office of the Mayor
===================

### **Mayor of Gold Bar**

Mayor Steve Yarbrough  took office at the regularly scheduled City of Gold Bar Council Meeting on January 4th, 2022.

Mayor Steve Yarbrough cell – 425.238.2655  
Contact the Mayor by email at **[mayor@cityofgoldbar.us](mailto:mayor@cityofgoldbar.us)**

**[Oath of Office](https://cityofgoldbar.us/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/Oath-of-Office_Mayor-Yarbrough.pdf) – Mayor Yarbrough**
